  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.utilities used by it.polimi.ingsw
    Class
    Description
    GraphicsType
    Contains the two possible client interfaces: CLI or GUI.

    A utility record for storing a couple of information into the same variable.

    Contains all the possible state in which the game can be.

    Contains all the possible colors of both students and professors.

    Contains the three colors of the towers.
